lines.lyric_english: The snow glows white on the mountain tonight
lines.lyric_chinese: 今天晚上，山上的雪发出白光
lines.lyric_pinyin: jīn tiān wǎn shàng ， shān shàng dí xuě fā chū bái guāng
lines.reference_translation: the snow glows white on the mountain tonight

lines.lyric_english: Not a footprint to be seen
lines.lyric_pinyin: bù shì bèi kàn jiàn dí jiǎo yìn
lines.reference_translation: not a footprint to be seen

lines.lyric_pinyin: yī gè gū lì dí wáng guó

lines.lyric_english: and it looks like I'm the Queen
lines.lyric_pinyin: kàn qǐ lái wǒ shì nǚ wáng
lines.reference_translation: and it looks like I'm the queen

lines.lyric_english: The wind is howling like this swirling storm inside
lines.lyric_chinese: 风嚎叫像这里面旋转的风暴
lines.lyric_pinyin: fēng háo jiào xiàng zhè lǐ miàn xuán zhuǎn dí fēng bào
lines.reference_translation: the wind is howling like this swirling storm inside

lines.lyric_english: Couldn't keep it in, Heaven knows I've tried
lines.lyric_chinese: 无法保持在, 天知道我已经尝试过了
lines.lyric_pinyin: Wúfǎ bǎochí zài, Tiānzhīdào wǒ yǐjīng chángshìguòle
lines.reference_translation: couldn't keep it in heaven knows I tried

lines.lyric_english: Don't let them in,don't let them see
lines.lyric_chinese: 不要让他们进来，不要让他们看到
lines.lyric_pinyin: Bùyào ràng tāmen jìnlái,Bùyào ràng tāmen kàn dào
lines.reference_translation: don't let them in don't let them see

lines.lyric_english: Be the good girl you always have to be
lines.lyric_chinese: 成为你永远不得不成为的好女孩
lines.lyric_pinyin: Chéngwéi nǐ yǒngyuǎn bùdé bù chéngwéi de hǎo nǚhái
lines.reference_translation: be the good girl you always have to be

lines.lyric_english: Conceal, don't feel,don't let them know
lines.lyric_chinese: 隐瞒，不感觉,不要让他们知道
lines.lyric_pinyin: Yǐnmán, bù gǎnjué,Bùyào ràng tāmen zhīdào
lines.reference_translation: conceal don't feel don't let them know
